snippet.title: Celebrities That Defended Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard
snippet.description:
Celebrities That Defended Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard. 
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been in a legal battle for quite some time; the actress from Aquaman has accused Johnny Depp during their marriage. After meeting in 2009 on the set of  "The Rum Diary", the couple married in 2015 in a private ceremony only to get divorced a year later.

Johnny Depp immediately lost his credence and respect, with major media houses like Warner Bros firing him immediately. However, millions of fans — alongside Johnny Depp — have maintained that the star is innocent. Recently, the case took an unexpected turn when it was revealed that the actress, Amber Heard, was being investigated for a perjury. Even though her legal team has come forward to dispute these claims, Johnny Depp is still enjoying support from thousands of individuals. 

Interestingly, there are several celebrities who believe Johnny Depp is innocent. In this video, we will be looking at all the celebrities who have spoken out in the defense of Johnny Depp! Do you think you know the celebrities that made this list? Keep watching to find out!

Subscribe for celeb drama:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVRROqlaHIP92Oun1Cl8XAw?sub_confirmation=1

#TheSocial #JohnnyDepp #AmberHeard
